    • Method Detail

      • calculateLoan

        public static SBLoan calculateLoan(SBLoan loan)
        It calculates loan fields like month payment, payoff sum and interests. It also checks if loan is active. We assume that we have the capitalisations: monthly, quarterly.
        Parameters:
        loan - Loan to calculate.
        Returns:
        Loan with completed data.

      • getTaxPerCent

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        Tax per cent.
